nodes.text: A tour guide droid with masculine programming was welcoming a group of Shadow Collective soldiers to Peace Park, located in the New Mandalorians' capital city of Sundari, during their takeover of the planet Mandalore when one of them blasted him in the face, destroying the hapless droid.

This tour guide droid first appeared in "Shades of Reason," the fifteenth episode of the canon animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' fifth season, where he was voiced by Dave Filoni, the supervising director of Star Wars: The Clone Wars.
The droid was designed by concept artist Chris Glenn.
